text:
="preserve">Omri Sharon (Hebrew: עמרי שרון; born 19 August 1964) is a former Israeli politician of Likud and Kadima. He is the son of Ariel Sharon, who was prime minister from 2001 till 2006.
Sharon Jr. was a major in the IDF and a Member of Knesset from 2003 till 2006.
He was found guilty of corruption charges in 2006 and was sentenced to prison.
